text: Novotroyevka () is a rural locality (a village) in Mrakovsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 32 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 32 km from Krasnousolsky, 3 km from Mrakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Novotroyevka
